member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ConfigurationKey.Scheduler.OneTimeRecordingsFileFormat
member.summary:
Format to which a finished recording's files are renamed. This format is the default format used for one-time television recordings and defines the full path and filename (without extension!). The following variables can be used:
VariableSubstituted by
%%CHANNEL%%The channel's name.
%%SCHEDULE%%The name of the schedule the program was recorded from.
%%CATEGORY%%The program's category or '#' if it hasn't got one.
%%TITLE%%The program's title (without episode title and/or number).
%%LONGTITLE%%The full program's title with episode title and/or number.
%%EPISODETITLE%%The program's episode title or '#' if it hasn't got one.
%%EPISODENUMBERDISPLAY%%The program's episode number as displayed.
%%EPISODENUMBER%%The program's episode number or '#' if it hasn't got one.
%%EPISODENUMBER2%%The program's episode number in two digits or '00' if it hasn't got one.
%%EPISODENUMBER3%%The program's episode number in three digits or '000' if it hasn't got one.
%%SERIES%%The program's series/season number or '#' if it hasn't got one.
%%SERIES2%%The program's series/season number in two digits or '00' if it hasn't got one.
%%DATE%%The program's airing date in the format yyyy-MM-dd.
%%YEAR%%The program's airing year.
%%MONTH%%The program's airing month as a number.
%%DAY%%The program's airing day.
%%DAYOFWEEK%%The program's airing day of the week.
%%HOURS%%The program's airing time's hours (24-hour format).
%%HOURS12%%The program's airing time's hours (12-hour format with AM/PM).
%%MINUTES%%The program's airing time's minutes.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ConfigurationKey.Scheduler.SeriesRecordingsFileFormat

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.TvChannels
member.summary: OBSOLETE! Don't use this rule anymore, it's only here for backwards compatibility.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.Channels
member.summary: Record on the given channel(s). Arguments are one or more channel IDs.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.NotOnChannels
member.summary: Do not record on the given channel(s). Arguments are one or more channel IDs.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.AroundTime
member.summary: Record the timeslot closest to the given start time (usually combined with TitleEquals).

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.StartingBetween
member.summary: Record a program when its start time is between the two given times.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.OnDate
member.summary: Record on this specific date (mutually exclusive with DaysOfWeek).

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.DaysOfWeek
member.summary: Record on these days of the week (mutually exclusive with OnDate), with second optional starting date argument.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.TitleEquals
member.summary: Record program with the given title.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.SubTitleEquals
member.summary: Record program with the given sub-title.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.SubTitleStartsWith
member.summary: Record program who's sub-title starts with the given text.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.SubTitleContains
member.summary: Record program who's sub-title contains the given text. If more than one text is given an OR will be applied.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.SubTitleDoesNotContain
member.summary: Record program who's sub-title does not contain the given text, only valid in combination with at least one SubTitleContains rule.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.EpisodeNumberEquals
member.summary: Record program with the given episode number.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.EpisodeNumberContains
member.summary: Record program who's episode number contains the given text. If more than one text is given an OR will be applied.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.EpisodeNumberDoesNotContain
member.summary: Record program who's episode number does not contain the given text, only valid in combination with at least one EpisodeNumberContains rule.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.EpisodeNumberStartsWith
member.summary: Record program who's episode number starts with the given text.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.TitleStartsWith
member.summary: Record program who's title starts with the given text.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.TitleContains
member.summary: Record program who's title contains the given text. If more than one text is given an OR will be applied.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.TitleDoesNotContain
member.summary: Record program who's title does not contain the given text, only valid in combination with at least one TitleContains rule.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.DescriptionContains
member.summary: Record program who's description contains the given text. If more than one text is given an OR will be applied.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.DescriptionDoesNotContain
member.summary: Record program who's description does not contain the given text, only valid in combination with at least one DescriptionContains rule.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.CategoryEquals
member.summary: Record programs from any of the categories given as arguments.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.CategoryDoesNotEqual
member.summary: Don't record programs in any of the categories given as arguments.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.DirectedBy
member.summary: Record program directed by given name.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.WithActor
member.summary: Record program which has the actor by the given name.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.SkipRepeats
member.summary: Only record first-run (non-repeat) programs if the argument to this rule is true.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.NewEpisodesOnly
member.summary: If this is true, don't include programs that were already recorded before (based on title/sub-title/episode number).

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.NewTitlesOnly
member.summary: If this is true, don't include programs that were already recorded before (based on title only).

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.ManualSchedule
member.summary: If this rule is added the schedule is a manual schedule with the given datetime and duration (ScheduleTime) arguments. When this rule is specified the TvChannels rule must be present with exactly one channel. The DaysOfWeek rule with one argument is optional, and no other rules are allowed.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.ProgramInfoContains
member.summary: Record program who's title, episode or description contains the given text. If more than one text is given an OR will be applied.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRuleType.ProgramInfoDoesNotContain
member.summary: Record program who's title, episode or description does not contain the given text, only valid in combination with at least one ProgramInfoContains rule.

member.summary: The card that was allocated for the required channel. If this is null the program has not been allocated and won't be recorded.

member.summary: The program that will be recorded.

member.name: P:ArgusTV.DataContracts.UpcomingRecording.ConflictingPrograms
member.summary: The list of programs that this program conflicts with. If CardChannelAllocation is null these are the programs that block the recording of this program, otherwise these are the programs that are blocked by this recording.
